title: Legacy Registration
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Legacy registration page
custom_steps: WHEN a user registers a new account
custom_expected:
THEN a new user account is created in Legacy
AND the user account is not in Okta

title: Okta Registration
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Okta registration page
custom_steps: WHEN a user registers a new account
custom_expected:
THEN a new user account is created in Legacy
AND the user account is in Okta

title: Okta Registration - Error Messaging
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Okta registration page
custom_steps: WHEN a user attempts to submit a new account with no fields filled out
custom_expected:
THEN the user account is not created
AND the required fields are highlighted

title: Okta Registration - Existing Account
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Okta registration page
custom_steps: WHEN a user attempts to submit a new account with the same email
custom_expected: THEN the user will see an Account Already Exists error message

title: Okta Registration - Age 13 or younger (COPPA)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Okta registration page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user attempts to submit a new account
AND sets the date of birth so the user is 13 or younger
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a You are not eligible to complete this form message

title: GDPR Opt-in Present
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the EU
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Okta login
AND the user is on the Sign Up form
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the explicit opt ins
AND the boxes should not be checked by default

title: GDPR Registration - Opted In
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the EU
custom_steps:
WHEN the user fills out the required forms
AND checks both boxes
AND registers a new account
custom_expected:
THEN an Okta admin should see both settings set to True in Okta profile for the user:
useMyPIIForMLBProductsServicesOptIn = true

title: GDPR Registration - Opted Out
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the EU
custom_steps:
WHEN the user fills out the required forms
AND leaves the Use my Personal Information for MLB Products and Services Opt-in uncheck
AND registers a new account
custom_expected:
THEN an Okta admin should see both settings set to True in Okta profile for the user
useMyPIIForMLBProductsServicesOptIn = false

title: Commercial/Marketing Opt-in Present
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is not in the EU
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Okta login
AND the user is on the Sign Up form
custom_expected: Then the user should see the commercial opt-in box

title: Commercial/Marketing Opted In
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is not in the EU
custom_steps:
WHEN the user fills out the required forms
AND checks the commercial opt in box
AND registers a new account
custom_expected:
THEN an Okta admin should see both settings set to True in Okta profile for the user
commercialEmailsOptin = true

title: Commercial/Marketing Opted Out
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is not in the EU
custom_steps:
WHEN the user fills out the required forms
AND checks the commercial opt in box
AND registers a new account
custom_expected:
THEN an Okta admin should see both settings set to True in Okta profile for the user
commercialEmailsOptin = false

title: Legacy Attributes Migrated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has logged into Legacy
AND a user has updated profile attributes in Legacy
custom_steps: WHEN a user logs into Okta successfully
custom_expected:
THEN the profile attributes from Legacy match the profile attributes in Okta, currently the fields are:
[Login, Email, First Name, Last Name, Birth Day, Birth Month, Birth Year, Hometown, Avatar]

title: Legacy Cookies Match Okta
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has logged into Legacy
AND a user has updated profile attributes in Legacy
custom_steps: WHEN a user logs into Okta successfully
custom_expected: THEN the guid and ipid are the same for the account in Legacy and Okta

title: Avatar and Name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a profile created in Legacy
AND the First and Last name is set in the profile
AND an avatar picture is set in the profile
custom_steps:
WHEN a user logs in to Okta
AND the user is redirected to the homepage
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the avatar in the header
AND clicking on the avatar will display the menu
AND the user will see the First and Last name
AND the user will see the avatar

title: Legacy Login Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Legacy login page
custom_steps: WHEN a user enters a valid email and password
custom_expected:
THEN the login is successful
AND the user account is not in Okta

title: Okta Login Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Okta login page
custom_steps: WHEN a user enters a valid email and password
custom_expected:
THEN the login is successful
AND the user account is in Okta

title: Empty Okta Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Okta login page
custom_steps: WHEN a user attempts to login with no fields filled out
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see an error message
AND the required field(s) will be highlighted

title: Invalid Okta Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Okta login page
custom_steps: WHEN a user attempts to submit an invalid email and password
custom_expected: THEN the user will see an Invalid Login error message

title: Okta Username Help
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Okta login page
custom_steps: WHEN a user hovers over the question mark symbol in the email field
custom_expected:
THEN the user is shown that this field is for "Username"
AND the symbol is NOT clickable.

title: Okta Password Help
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Okta login page
custom_steps: WHEN a user hovers over the question mark symbol in the password field
custom_expected:
THEN the user is shown that this field is for "Password"
AND the symbol is NOT clickable.

title: Legacy Forgot Password Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on Legacy login page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Forget Password
AND types in an email not associated to an account
custom_expected: THEN the user will see an a Forget Password page

title: Okta Forgot Password Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on an Okta login page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Needs help signing in
AND clicks on Forgot password
custom_expected: THEN the user will see an a Forget Password page

title: Okta Forgot Password Legacy Redirect
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an Okta login page
(This test case may get deleted in the future as this is the current path as of October 2018).
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Needs help signing in
AND clicks on Forgot password
custom_expected: THEN currently the server will override the Okta forgot password link and point to the Legacy Forgot Password form.

title: Okta Invalid Email
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Forget Password page
custom_steps:
WHEN types in an email not associated to an account
AND clicks on Get a News Password
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive an email saying "We're sorry, there is no MLB.com account associated with this e-mail add

title: Legacy New Password Migration
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user receives a new password
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on a Legacy login page
AND types in the email and the new password
custom_expected: THEN the login is successful

title: Okta New Password
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user receives a new password
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on an Okta login page
AND types in the email and the new password
custom_expected: THEN the login is successful

title: Okta Forgot Password Email
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Forget Password page
custom_steps:
WHEN types in an email associated to an account
AND clicks on Get a News Password
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive an email with a new password

title: Legacy Page Email Update
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user changes this email on the Legacy profile page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the Legacy login page
AND the user types in the new email and the password
custom_expected: THEN the login is successful

title: Legacy Email Update on Okta Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user changes this email on the Legacy profile page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the Okta login page
AND the user types in the new email and the password
custom_expected: THEN the login is successful

title: Legacy Page Password Update
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user changes this password on the Legacy profile page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the Legacy login page
AND the user types in the new email and the new password
custom_expected: THEN the login is successful

title: Legacy Password Update on Okta Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user changes this password on the Legacy profile page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the Okta login page
AND the user types in the email and the new password
custom_expected: THEN the login is successful

title: Legacy Logout
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user logs in to Legacy login page
custom_steps: WHEN a user logs out (via Legacy)
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see ipid and fprt in the Cookies

title: Okta Login - Legacy Logout
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user logs in to Okta login page
custom_steps: WHEN a user logs out (via Legacy)
custom_expected:
THEN the user will not see ipid and fprt in the Cookies
AND the user will not see Okta-Token-Store in the Local Storage
AND the user will be forced to the login screen where appropriate

title: Okta Login Redirect
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on an Okta login page with a redirect url
custom_steps: WHEN a user enters valid email and password
custom_expected: THEN the user should be redirected to the proper url

title: Okta Registration Redirect
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on an Okta login page with a redirect url
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks to Sign Up
AND the user registers a new account
custom_expected: THEN the user should be redirected to the proper url

title: Okta Forgot Password Redirect
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a password from Reset Password email
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on an Okta login page
AND the user logs in with the email and the reset password
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be redirected to homepage
AND the user should be logged in as
AND can access their profile or see avatar (if set in the profile)

title: Okta Access Token Expiration
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user logs into Okta login page
custom_steps: WHEN a user hits Okta login page again within; on QA 5 minutes, on Production = 2 Hours.
custom_expected:
THEN the user will not need a new access token
AND the user will be redirected to the site

title: Legacy Access Token Expiration
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user logs into the Okta login page
custom_steps: WHEN a user hits the Legacy login page again within; in QA 5 minutes, in Production 2 Hours.
custom_expected:
THEN the user will not need a new access token
AND the user will be redirected to the site

title: Okta Session Token
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user logs into the Okta login page
custom_steps: WHEN a user hits the Okta login page after; in QA 5 minutes, in Production 2 Hours.
custom_expected:
THEN the user should still have a valid session
AND the user will get a new session token
AND the user will be redirected to the site

title: Okta Session Token - New Browser
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged into Okta login
custom_steps:
WHEN the user closes the browser
AND opens a new browser
AND navigates to the Okta login within; in QA 5 minutes, in Production 2 Hours.
custom_expected:
THEN the user should have a valid session
AND the user should be redirected to the site

title: Okta Session Token Expiration
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged into the Okta login
custom_steps:
WHEN the user closes the browser
AND opens a new browser
AND navigates to the Okta login after; in QA 1 hour, in Production 90 Days.
custom_expected:
THEN the user will not have a valid session
AND the user will need to sign into the site

title: Linked Purchase - New Account
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on MLB.TV
custom_steps:
WHEN a user creates an account
AND purchases MLB.TV
custom_expected:
THEN the user account is created
AND the account is linked to the purchase

title: Linked Purchase - Existing Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on MLB.TV
AND the user has an existing account
custom_steps:
WHEN a user logins
AND purchases MLB.TV
custom_expected: THEN the account is linked to the purchase

title: Free Game - New Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on MLB.TV
AND the user does not have an account
custom_steps:
WHEN a user accesses a Free Game Feed
AND creates an account
custom_expected: THEN the user can view the MLB.TV Free Game

title: Free Game - Existing Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on MLB.TV
AND the user has an account
custom_steps:
WHEN a user accesses a Free Game Feed
AND logs in with an account
custom_expected: THEN the user can view the MLB.TV Free Game

title: Legacy - New User Creation and Login
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user creates a user in Legacy
custom_steps: WHEN a user hits Legacy login page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be logged in
AND the user will see IPID and FPRT in the Cookies

title: Okta - Legacy New User Creation
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user creates a user in Legacy
custom_steps: WHEN a user hits Okta login page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will need to login
AND the user can login successfully
AND the user will see Okta-Token-Store in the Local Storage
AND the user will see IPID and FPRT in the Cookies

title: Login/Logout Okta & Legacy - Token Verification
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user logged into Okta with User Account A
custom_steps:
WHEN a user logs out of Legacy with User Account A
AND logs into Legacy with User Account B
custom_expected:
Then the user will be logged in
AND the user will see Okta-Token-Store in the Local Storage for User B
AND the user will see IPID and FPRT in the Cookies for User B

title: Forms Verification
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on Form 1
AND the user logs into Form 1
AND a user opens Form 2 in a different tab (same browser session)
custom_steps:
WHEN a user fills out submits Form 1
AND a user fills out and submits Form 2
custom_expected:
THEN Form 1's success page displays
AND Form 2's success page displays
AND form submission data is recorded under the correct form

title: Legacy Header - Profile Subnav
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user logs into Okta
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on their profile icon
AND a user clicks on the any of the subnav items except for "Logout"
custom_expected: THEN the user should be redirected to the Legacy Profile page

title: Okta - Remember Me
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has an active login
AND the user is on the Okta Login Page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user checks off Remember Me before logging in
AND the user logs in
AND the user logs out
AND returns to the okta login page
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the email used previously to log in pre-filled on the username field
AND the ln cookie will be set to the email address.

title: Okta - Terms of Use
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on an Okta login page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Needs help signing in
AND clicks Terms of Use
custom_expected: THEN the MLB Terms of use page is opened in a new tab.

title: Okta - Privacy Policy
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on an Okta login page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Needs help signing in
AND clicks Privacy Policy
custom_expected: THEN the MLB Privacy Policy page is opened in a new tab.

title: Okta - Help Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on an Okta login page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks on Needs help signing in
AND clicks Help
custom_expected:
THEN the help page is opened in a new tab.
AND the user is sent to https://www.mlb.com/official-information/contact
